StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMedicalStatusData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWA_ID int AS
SELECT COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), MS.MCRC_RECEIVED_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS MCRC_RECEIVED_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), MS.BUMED_FORWARD_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS BUMED_FORWARD_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(11), MS.MCRC_RETURN_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS MCRC_RETURN_DATE, MSD.MEDICAL_STATUS_DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION, MSD.MEDICAL_STATUS_DISPOSITION_CODE FROM MEDICAL_STATUS MS INNER JOIN MEDICAL_STATUS_DISPOSITION MSD ON (MS.MEDICAL_STATUS_DISPOSITION_CODE = MSD.MEDICAL_STATUS_DISPOSITION_CODE AND MS.NWA_ID = @NWA_ID)
